title: RBI Monetary Policy: Will Mint Street's last meet under Shaktikanta Das unlock Rs 1.2 lakh crore for growth?
description: The Reserve Bank of India’s (RBI) final monetary policy committee (MPC) meeting under Governor Shaktikanta Das, whose term ends next week, began on December 4. While the repo rate is widely expected to remain steady at 6.5%, all eyes are on a potential cash reserve ratio (CRR) cut—a move that could ...
